summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior.

We have class AudioToMultiLabelDataset. It loads a manifest JSON file with audio file paths, durations, label strings (space-separated). It filters by duration min/max, optionally trims silence, windowing, shifting, normalizes audio, supports regression tasks, calculates label occurrence, delimiter for label splitting, normalize to dB.

Thus summary: dataset class for loading audio files and multi-label annotations from a manifest, providing preprocessing (duration filtering, silence trimming, windowing, shifting, audio normalization) and converting label strings to tensors, supporting classification or regression, optional label occurrence stats.

Business intent: enable training and inference of audio classification, speaker recognition, VAD, regression models using PyTorch (or similar) by providing ready-to-use dataset handling multi-label audio data.

Keywords: audio dataset, multi-label, manifest, preprocessing, duration filtering, silence trimming, windowing, shifting, normalization, regression, label encoding, speaker recognition, VAD.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. Provide JSON.

Summary: "A dataset class that reads a line‑by‑line JSON manifest describing audio file locations, durations and space‑separated label vectors, filters entries by duration, optionally trims silence, applies windowing or shift for VAD/speaker tasks, normalizes audio amplitude, and converts the label strings into tensor representations for multi‑label classification or regression."

Business intent: "Facilitate rapid development of audio‑based machine‑learning pipelines (e.g., speech command detection, speaker identification, voice activity detection, or regression on acoustic features) by handling data loading, preprocessing, and label encoding in a single reusable component."

Keywords list: ["audio loading", "multi‑label classification", "manifest parsing", "duration filtering", "silence trimming", "window slicing", "shifted frames", "audio normalization", "regression support", "label encoding", "speaker recognition", "voice activity detection"].

Make sure JSON format correct.
